HIST 661 History of non-Western                          and the ways in which various historiographical
Christianity (3 sem. hrs.)                               and methodological approaches have affected the
During the twentieth century, it became clear that       way we understand the people and events of the
the majority of Christians worldwide were not            Atlantic basin.
Europeans or North Americans but Latin
Americans, Africans, and Asians. Some observers
interpret this as a major shift in the very nature of
Christianity, but others view it as the renewal of
what is essentially a non-Western religion. Instead
                                                         Human Kinetics
